ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard icon bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Thinking about this, I believe I do get flashing icons if I m not playing a song.  Like that ever happens. Kit I haven t gotten flashing icons for spells/songs
ygData.messageBody:
Thinking about this, I believe I do get flashing icons if I'm not playing a
song. Like that ever happens.

Kit

I haven't gotten flashing icons for spells/songs
wearing off since phase 2 beta. And yes, it's extremely annoying in
kedge.

I've /bugged it at least 5 times since release. Feel free to start a
thread about it that Abashi can ignore. :)

Laluni
